origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TaxAPI.get_historical_records', 'description': 'This function retrieves the tax filing records of a company for a specified number of years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyID', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The unique identifier of the company.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years of historical records to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'records', 'description': 'The historical tax filing records of the company.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 TaxAPI.get_historical_records, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyID'是'12345', 'years'是'3'.
